div.p: Normalized probability distributions of the CCSD/daDZ isotropic ( α iso, blue) and anisotropic ( α aniso, red) polarizabilities in the QM7b database. Molecules with the smallest and largest α iso and α aniso values are depicted at the left and right of the figure, respectively. Molecules with intermediate α iso and α aniso values (≈20, 40, 60, and 80 Bohr 3) are depicted in the middle of the figure. Histogram bin widths were set to 2.0 Bohr 3.
